Container.Name: Cloud Backup: Google Cloud Storage
Container.Description: Synchronise a mounted directory to Google Cloud Storage for offsite backups.

Config.Name: Google Project ID
Config.Description: The ID of your Google Cloud project (eg: galloping-scallywag-01483)

Config.Name: Service Account File
Config.Description: The path to the service account JSON file

Config.Name: Bucket Name
Config.Description: The bucket to sync files to

Config.Name: Bucket Path
Config.Description: The path prefix in the bucket to sync files to (defaults to the root)

Config.Name: Delete Files
Config.Description: Whether to delete files in the bucket that don't exist locally after syncing (one of true or false)
